noDataDesc: Import a CSV file with tick data or OHLCV bars to get started. The data will be automatically converted to Parquet format for fast processing.

import.title: Import CSV Data
import.desc: Select a CSV file with tick data or OHLCV bars and configure the instrument settings.

downloadDialog.title: Download Historical Data
downloadDialog.desc: Download free tick data from Dukascopy servers. Select an instrument, date range, and configure settings.
downloadDialog.customSymbolHint: Or enter a custom Dukascopy symbol
downloadDialog.tickDesc: Raw tick data (Bid/Ask/Volume). Larger files, highest precision.
downloadDialog.m1Desc: Aggregated 1-minute OHLCV bars. Smaller files, faster processing.
downloadDialog.alreadyDownloading: This symbol is already being downloaded.
